title: Wildcats and Pipedreams
creator_credit: David Greig, John Richardson and Kestrel Film & Television
brief_description: Wildcats and Pipedreams follows the crew of an oil drilling rig in the Timor Sea. It gives a fascinating insight into the lives of people living and working in a remote and difficult environment.
creator_credit_for_label: David Greig, John Richardson and Kestrel Film & Television
